name: French Morphology
description: A study of the morphological system of modern French, its relationship to syntax and phonology; theoretical notions derived from the analysis of specific data. Special attention will be given to the methods of analysis and classification, as well as selected morphological categories (verbs, nouns, etc.). [24L, 12T]
prerequisites: FRE272Y5, FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
